title: Five Things To Know About 'Bridgerton'
description:
Juliet Litman and Kate Halliwell tell you five things you need to know about 'Bridgerton,' the sexy new period drama from Shonda Rhimes.

Hosts: Juliet Litman and Kate Halliwell
